title: mRemoteNG doesn't start if keyfile not available
author: klukaszczyk
body_snippet:

If private keyfile is used for SSH authentication, and it's not available mRemoteNG doesn't start. It display error "Could not load startup file".
Expected action is to ignore error and switch to default authentication using login and password like in ...

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
Fix candidate packaged in PR #3114: https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/pull/3114 
This hardens startup loading so PuTTY provider failures are logged and do not abort loading the connections file. 
Validation run on fork (x86/x64/ARM64 + tests/specs): https://github.com/robertpopa22/mRemoteNG/actions/runs/21787754981
